title: 加州橡树岭高中社会学实验课堂

action: Sit quietly at desk, observe classroom and teacher
thoughts: First day of this sociology experiment. I should pay close attention to the rules and follow instructions carefully. The uniforms and flags make this feel very official. I want to make sure I start with good discipline points.
memory: Noticed strict classroom environment with flags and uniforms
Preparing to follow all rules carefully

action: Check discipline board scores while maintaining proper posture
thoughts: I should see where our group stands on the discipline board. Following rules carefully is important for social acceptance and avoiding extra cleaning duties.

action: Nod discreetly in agreement while maintaining proper posture
thoughts: Good, someone else is thinking about teamwork too. Following rules and cooperating will help us both avoid low scores and extra cleaning duties. I should stay focused on the teacher's instructions though.

action: Maintain proper posture while discreetly monitoring the discipline board and teacher's movements
thoughts: I need to be extra careful after that whispered exchange. The teacher might be watching us more closely now. I should focus on appearing completely compliant and attentive to avoid losing any discipline points.
